      • getNeighborPoints

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getNeighborPoints​(java.awt.Point p)
        This method takes in the heroes current location and returns the neighboring points to the hero in order to eventually look for enemies.
        Parameters:
        p - the Heroes current location
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of points above, below, left, and right of heroes location

      • isMoveLegal

        public boolean isMoveLegal​(java.awt.Point p)
        This method takes in various points and checks to see if they exist on the game board.
        Parameters:
        p - a point received.
        Returns:
        true if on board and false if not on board

      • makeAMove

        public java.awt.Point makeAMove​(java.awt.Point p)
        This method creates an ArrayList of possible moves for a hero to make. Creates an ArrayList of possible moves above, below, left, and right of the heroes current location and then, using a random number between 0-3 decides a point to return after checking with isMoveLegal().
        Parameters:
        p - the heroes current location
        Returns:
        A point for the hero to move to.

      • attackMove

        public int attackMove()
        This method is the attacking method. generates an attack number between 10 and maxDamage. Damage is returned as negative integer. DMG = (negative health points)
        Returns:
        attack points

      • setMaxDamage

        public void setMaxDamage​(int x)
        Sets the max damage allowed for the hero.
        Parameters:
        x - max attack points for hero
